author: etan_status
content:
Thanks for sharing, interesting work. Would you mind elaborating how the measurements of light client sync times / downloaded data were performed? 
1 `LightClientUpdate` is about 25K of static data (SSZ snappy); up through 128 of them can be fetched per request. To verify, 1 aggregated BLS verify is needed per update.
Also, how do you guarantee being connected to an honest prover?
